verbs.description: U.S. President Donald Trump " flip - flops " so much in his stance over trade and tariffs with China that it [V: 's] [ARG2: difficult] [ARG1: to know what stocks to buy and avoid] , an economist and strategist told CNBC ahead of the next round of Sino - U.S. trade talks aimed at averting a trade war .
